column5: Hope no one gets caught in the traffic mess as they clean up this derailment. Doubly hope that there's nothing toxic in the rail cars as the river is a source of drinking water for many.  http://www.theglobeandmail.com/news/national/freight-train-derails-near-sudbury-ont-after-bridge-collapse/article12302066/#dashboard/follows/
wow. I also hope nothing toxic got into the water!
May it end well for all concerned. Accidents do happen.
Wanup runs into the French River as well
I might be heading up there tonight to trouble shoot our fibre optic cable that runs beside the tracks. If I end up going, I'll snap some pics.
